subject: need some advice regarding test of socket/threads...
msgSnippet: Hi All, First of all I would like to thank all of you who replyed to my last mail regarding tests of private/protected methods - YOU WHERE GREAT ;-). But now I
messageBody:
Hi All,

First of all I would like to thank all of you who replyed to my last mail
regarding tests of private/protected methods - YOU WHERE GREAT ;-).

But now I have a problem (again) which I would like some feedback on. Its
regarding sockets and threads. Could some of you tell me how you do your
tests (best practice) on sockets, network and threads? PLEASE :-)

Best regards,

J. Andersen
